goals.title: Graduate Successfully
goals.description: Complete my B.Tech in Computer Science with excellent grades.

goals.title: Master E & CS
goals.description: Develop strong skills in Electronic and Computer Science.

goals.title: Contribute to Open Source
goals.description: Give back to the developer community through open-source projects.

goals.title: Start My Own Tech Company
goals.description: Launch a startup to solve real-world problems using tech.

goals.title: Help People
goals.description: Build solutions that positively impact lives and make technology accessible.

goals.title: Get Internship
goals.description: Work with leading tech firms to gain hands-on experience.

goals.title: Learn Cybersecurity
goals.description: Understand and protect systems against cyber threats.

goals.title: Win a Hackathon
goals.description: Participate in coding competitions and win a national hackathon.

goals.title: Improve Public Speaking
goals.description: Develop confidence in communicating ideas to a large audience.

goals.title: Earn Certifications
goals.description: Achieve globally recognized tech certifications (AWS, Google Cloud, etc.).
